function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Highly contagious coronavirus (SARS-CoV-2) causing COVID-19 poses a significant risk of transmission","Impact":"Severe illness, overwhelmed healthcare systems, and widespread economic and social disruption","Mitigation":"Implementing strict public health measures, promoting vaccination, and increasing awareness about transmission prevention","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, ventilation systems, and air purifiers","People":"General population, healthcare workers, and elderly individuals","Owner":"Government, public health organizations, and employers"},{"Description":"Debates about living and working patterns in the built environment may lead to inadequate implementation of disease prevention measures","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission and potential outbreaks in communities and workplaces","Mitigation":"Educating the public about the importance of disease prevention measures, promoting flexible work arrangements, and redesigning built environments for better ventilation and hygiene","Technologies":"Remote work technologies, building automation systems, and mobile healthcare apps","People":"Workers, employers, and community members","Owner":"Employers, building managers, and urban planners"}]}
